trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: When you use Mozilla VPN, your internet activity is encrypted and routed through servers based in a location of your choice.
trans-unit.target: Cuant che tu dopris Mozilla VPN, la tô ativitât su internet e ven cifrade e instradade midiant servidôrs che si cjatin inte posizion che tu tu âs sielt.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Sometimes, you might pick a location for a specific purpose; for example, if you’re traveling internationally, you could choose a server location in your home country so that your banking apps function more smoothly.
trans-unit.target: Cualchi volte tu podaressis volê sielzi une posizion par une reson particolâr; par esempli, se tu stâs viazant pal forest, tu puedis sielzi une posizion dal servidôr tal to paîs in mût che lis aplicazions associadis ae tô bancje a funzionin cence fastidis.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: But, for times when you don’t have a specific location in mind, the VPN will recommend server locations. These recommendations are based on the number of servers available, as well as their distance from you.
trans-unit.target: Ma, par chês voltis che no tu âs iniment une posizion specifiche, la VPN ti consearà lis posizions dai servidôrs. Chescj conseis si basin sul numar di servidôrs disponibii e su la lôr distance di te.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: These recommended locations will refresh occasionally when the VPN is turned off; if you’d like to use VPN with the best performance and speed, choose a recommended server location.
trans-unit.target: Chestis posizions conseadis a vignaran inzornadis di cuant in cuant, cuant che la VPN e je disativade; se tu desideris doprâ une VPN cu lis prestazions miôrs e la velocitât plui alte, sielç une des posizions conseadis.
Parcè ciertis posizions a vegnin conseadis?
